definition: eye/small hole/crux (of a matter)/CL:隻|只[zhi1],雙|双[shuang1]/classifier for big hollow things (wells, stoves, pots etc)

sentences.english: Use earplugs to eliminate noise, an eyeshade to kill the light, and turn the air-conditioning valve on high.
sentences.chinese: 用耳塞降低噪音，用眼罩來遮光，把空調風調大點。

sentences.english: Draw on the eyepatch to have a good sleep.
sentences.chinese: 將眼罩戴上，美美地睡上一覺。
必要時要戴上安全眼罩。

sentences.english: An adjustable strap allows you to comfortably adjust the mask to fit your face.
sentences.chinese: 眼罩後面的束帶可自由伸縮，根據臉型調整長短。

sentences.english: If you're sensitive to light while sleeping, get thick drapes to cover your windows or use an eye cover.
sentences.chinese: 如果睡覺時你對光敏感，掛上厚窗簾或用眼罩。

sentences.english: The head was brownish with dark streaking and a dark eye and ear-covert patch.
sentences.chinese: 呈褐色有條紋的頭部，黑色的眼睛和遮蔽耳朵的眼罩。

sentences.english: Plus, your pirate optometrist supplied the men with eye patches.
sentences.chinese: 並且，你的海盜驗光配鏡師爲海盜們提供眼罩。

sentences.english: Today, , I was laying in bed naked and blindfolded.
sentences.chinese: 今天，我裸身躺在牀上，被蒙上了眼罩。

sentences.english: I had to wear a patch after the initial surgery, for about one day.
sentences.chinese: 手術後我必須戴一天的眼罩。

sentences.english: A squint can sometimes be corrected by an eyepatch.
sentences.chinese: 斜視有時候可以通過戴眼罩來糾正。

sentences.english: You must put on an eye-shield when you are looking at the welded sparkle.
sentences.chinese: 翻譯當你在看電焊的火花時候一定要戴上護眼罩。

sentences.english: Wear goggles, spirit let your hair down, close the eyes for rest or sleep for a night's sleep.
sentences.chinese: 戴上眼罩，精神徹底放鬆，閉目養神或乾脆睡上一覺。

sentences.english: You can cover your eyes with an opaque eye mask.
sentences.chinese: 你可以用不透光的眼罩把眼睛矇住。
黃色而透明的眼罩讓我的視線一片渾濁。

sentences.english: We kinda go through life with blinders.
sentences.chinese: 我們有點帶着戴着眼罩在生活，忽略了周圍。

sentences.english: I missed the beauty of valley because I kept my blinders on.
sentences.chinese: 我錯過了美麗的山谷，因爲我一直對我的眼罩。
